title: Quick cheat cottage pie
ingredients: ['2 handfuls frozen peas', '1 small tin sliced carrots', '1 large tin minced beef and onions', '1 beef stock cube (Knorr® Stockpot)', '1 tablespoon Bolognese sauce (optional)', '1 to 2 teaspoons English mustard', '2 tablespoons tomato ketchup', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 packet mashed potato mix (I used Asda® Bubble & Squeak mix)', 'knob butter', '1 tablespoon double cream (optional)', '400ml boiling water']
